creator: Poincaré, Raymond
title: On active service with the British Expedition Force
source: Poincaré, Raymond: On active service with the British Expedition Force  Frenchmen! Your aviators by means of dropping bombs, have killed a large number of civilians, men, women and children in the recent weeks, far and near of the German frontier ... ; Berlin, 26th July 1916. Berlin
alternative: Frenchmen! Your aviators by means of dropping bombs, have killed a large number of civilians, men, women and children in the recent weeks, far and near of the German frontier ... ; Berlin, 26th July 1916
subject: Krieg 1914 1918
